dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Attention Google:

On behalf of Paramount Pictures Corporation ("Paramount"), I am writing to notify you of the infringement of Paramountâ€™s intellectual property rights ("Paramount Rights") in the titles identified in this email in Google search results.

The search results and links identified in this email are specific examples of Google search results linking to video files, video streams or websites that infringe upon Paramount Rights.
We, on behalf of and with the authorization of, Paramount hereby demand that Google promptly remove and disable the links the infringing files identified in this email.

This letter is not a complete statement of Paramountâ€™s remedies in connection with this matter, and nothing contained herein constitutes an express or implied waiver of any rights, remedies, or defenses of Paramount in connection with this matter, all of which are expressly reserved.

The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the materials in the manner described herein is not authorized by Paramount, its agent, or the law. The information in this notice is accurate. Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Paramount with respect to this matter.

IMPORTANT NOTICE:  None of the information contained in this legal notice is to be transmitted and/or released by you to any third party, including but not limited to Chilling Effects (chillingeffects.org), without the express written permission of Paramount and or his agent.  
We appreciate your prompt attention to this important matter.

Sincerely,
MiMTiD Corp.
[redacted]
Managing Director
[redacted]
[redacted]mimtid.com
